actions.text: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Aguilar to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Aguilar to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment requires the Department of Transportation and the Department of Defense to work together to help veterans transition into civilian jobs driving commercial trucks.
purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require that the DOT, in coordination with DOD, implement the recommendations of a report issued by the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration to help veterans transition into civilian jobs driving commercial motor vehicles, including by obtaining commercial driver's license.
